content.description: A real shame this one isn't longer. Start on the in-cut crimps at mid height. Proceed. Pretty sure the easiest way down is to down climb the problem.
content.location: Just off of the main cliff, look for the short sharp arete.

content.description: Start on the two jug pockets on the left side of the overhang. Work up and right. Top out over the prow. Walk down the right side of the boulder, there's nice steps.
content.location: Down the cliff 50 yards from seamless, the smaller boulder with the orange ish overhang.

content.description: Start right hand on the low sculpted pinch and left around the arete. get no hands on the ledge above and down climb.
content.location: First overhung problems seen on the way to the main cliff. On the not hallway side of the block.

content.description: Grades? Pretty darn cool one. Left hand on the slopey crimp, right on the shallow pocket/ divot under the right facing rail. Top out onto ledge. Down climb or traverse left until you can WALK to the top of the block. Walk off near the wide entrance of the hallway.  This route could possibly go starting left hand lower on the hollow sounding edge, much harder.
content.protection: pads. Down climb or traverse left until you can WALK to the top of the block. Easy down climb near the wide entrance of the hallway.
content.location: Just left of Dingus, First overhung section on your way to the main cliff.

content.description: Hosts the easiest lines and some fun harder ones. Be sure to have a property line map if you explore further down the cliff line. It does intersect with private property at some unmarked point.
